name: Semantic Kernel
key_features: Model-agnostic framework with connectors for OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Hugging Face, and NVIDIA NIM.
Modular skill system combining native code, prompt templates, and plugins.
Planners for goal-based orchestration and multi-agent workflows.
Built-in memory and vector store connectors for context persistence.
Supports C#, Python, and Java with enterprise-ready tooling.
supported_models: Hugging Face and NVIDIA NIM models
Local models via Ollama, LM Studio, or ONNX
